content: Rollbit.com is The #1 Solana Casino in this space with over 11,000,000(!) SOL won since it was added as an option, making rollbit the obvious choice for Solana investors trying their luck. To help spread awareness we are launching this signature campaign and if you are a quality poster who frequents the gambling boards we want to hire YOU!Rules & Requirements:Wear the Signature and Avatar.Make a minimum of 20 constructive posts each week that you participate in order to receive a payment.Make a minimum of 10 constructive posts in the Gambling section each week in order to receive a payment. These 10 will count towards the 20 post minimum weekly requirement.Posts in Off-Topic, Games and Rounds, any and all bounty/campaign threads as well as threads where your signature is not displayed will not count towards the weekly requirement.If you receive legitimate negative feedback from a DT-member during your stay in this campaign you may be removed without payment or notice.If you join with both your main and alt account and you are found out you will be removed without payment or notice as well as getting negative feedback.Do not wear any other Signature or Avatar during your stay in this campaign, doing so will result in your removal without payment or notice.You need to have received at least 5 merit in the last 120 days in order to take part in this campaign.Each payment will be sent directly to your bech32 BTC address each Sunday.Each week will run from Sundays>Saturdays according to my timezone (CET). Cut-off is Saturdays at 23:59:59.This Campaign will be open for Full Members, Sr. Members, Hero Members and Legendary Members.Rollbit.com reserves the right to make changes and/or cancel this campaign at any time and at their own discretion. Each started week will be paid out in full.Payouts & Positions:15x Full Members - $40 in BTC/Week.20x Sr. Members - $65 in BTC/Week.25x Hero/Legendary Members - $80 in BTC/Week.The Signatures:Full
